hello.text: I've been stuck like this for days.{n}Can't revert back to normal anymore.

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: Angry. Stuck.{n}Can't even walk or fly straight.

what.name: How did you twist your bones like this ?
what.text: I was laughing at Sekibanki and trying to imitate her with my powers.{n}Bad idea.

check.name: Check out her body
check.narrator: {i}Nothing unusual...{n}Aside from her face turned backwards.{s}

scanner.name: Use the lunarian scanner
scanner.narrator: {i}Her bones and ligaments around the neck are twisted.{n}Using her power like this was clearly a bad idea.{s}

scanner.name: Use the lunarian scanner
scanner.narrator: {i}The damage you did actually helped a bit.{n}Now you should be able to operate her.{s}

punch.name: Punch her head back into place
punch.narrator: {i}You punch her hard and hear a loud crack.{n}Congratulations, you fractured the bones !{s}

painkillers.name: Give her pain killers
painkillers.text: Pain killers ?{n}No thanks, pain makes me more alive !

operate.name: Operate her
operate.narrator: {i}It takes you a few hours in the block,{n}but you manage to put back most of her bones in the right place{s}
